Key Match Events: Coby White made a go-ahead layup with 47 seconds left
Zach LaVine had 35 points, 10 rebounds and eight assists
Nikola Vucevic had 24 points and 11 boards
Devin Vassell threw away the ball for San Antonio
White then drove into the lane and dunked over a late-arriving Wembanyama
Miscellaneous Highlights: Chicago used an 11-0 run to trim San Antonio's lead to 79-71 with 5:24 left in the third quarter
San Antonio led 110-103 with 3:53 left, but Vucevic and LaVine each made a 3 to get Chicago within one with 2:38 to go
Others: Chicago won for the fourth time in five games
San Antonio carried a 95-82 lead into the final period
Chris Paul added 18 points and nine assists in the opener of a four-game trip
Chicago went 5 for 8 from 3 in the fourth quarter, compared to 1 for 9 for San Antonio
